titleStmt.title: A letter of the officers of the Army in Scotland under the commander in chief there, to the officers of the Army in England.

publicationStmt.publisher: Edinburgh, Printed by Christopher Higgins, in Harts Close, over against the Trone-Church, and re-printed at London,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: William Clarke, secretary.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Harts Close, over against the Trone-Church
